version_description:
The wizards of DragonVale are coming together to celebrate another fantastic year of dragons and magic, and everyone is invited!
• Participate in the Jolly Jubilee to earn Iceberries and win fabulous new prizes.
• Collect 5 brand new dragons discovered by each of the House wizards and witches.
• Catch Iceberries and drop Dragon Coins in the Fort of Frivolity.
• Find secret presents hiding in your dragon park.

The wizards of DragonVale are coming together to celebrate another fantastic year of dragons and magic, and everyone is invited!
• Participate in the Jolly Jubilee to earn Iceberries and win fabulous new prizes.
• Collect 5 brand new dragons discovered by each of the House wizards and witches.
• Catch Iceberries and drop Dragon Coins in the Fort of Frivolity.
• Find secret presents hiding in your dragon park.

- updated Logos
- updated Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

- updated Logos
- updated Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
- bug-fixes
- bug-fixes

After the crazy paradise party, it is time for something more chill and laid back. Even though the summer is not over yet, let’s all gather around the camp fire and tell each other stories of fond summer days past. Numerous of our favorite DragonVale wizards will be joining us in this camping miracle, and they can’t wait to share the exciting things we have prepared.
• Discover the new hidden dragon (funny oxymoron, eh)
• Check out our new pretty event island to get you in the mood for fall
• Play our pride and joy - Eggy Hatchy! A new mini game to save you from boredom

Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes
- bug fixes
- bug fixes

- iOS 14 compatibility adjustments
- fixed issue that weather set from the "Weather Station" and "Twilight Tower" reverted back to default after app restart
- fixed issues with video ads for better experience
- fixed rare feeding bug
- fixed rare issue with the Eggy Hatchy ticket regeneration timer
- general bug fixes

- iOS 14 compatibility adjustments
- fixed issue that weather set from the "Weather Station" and "Twilight Tower" reverted back to default after app restart
- fixed issues with video ads for better experience
- fixed rare feeding bug
- fixed rare issue with the Eggy Hatchy ticket regeneration timer
- general bug fixes

- added current weather indicator in the breeding UI
- fixed some issues when using Tolzar's Optical Oracle
- fixed issue that game sound would still play when devices was muted
- general bug fixes
